content: The Sterness of Stone can be found at the Fright Cliff - Rockrest Flat Shrine. Just to the left, of the Shrine you can find a small arena. Once you enter it, you will fight the Stone Vanguard. Defeating it will drop the Sterness of Stone.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sterness_of_Stone.md', within the main section titled 'Sterness of Stone'.
The content is as follows:
The Sterness of Stone can be found at the Fright Cliff - Rockrest Flat Shrine. Just to the left, of the Shrine you can find a small arena. Once you enter it, you will fight the Stone Vanguard. Defeating it will drop the Sterness of Stone.
